question: Garamthan, Harithan, Jahera, Sabitrithan and Santalburithan are local names of the sacred groves of which of the following states?
explanation: Garamthan, Harithan, Jahera, Sabitrithan and Santalburithan are local names of the sacred groves of West Bengal. They are total 39 in number. They are places of special religious importance to a particular culture.
